channel.title: Rich content on Hugo Profile
channel.description: Recent content in Rich content on Hugo Profile

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. Gist Simple Shortcode {{< gist spf13 7896402 "img.html" >}} Vimeo Simple Shortcode {{< vimeo 146022717 >}}
